DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Short-term Effects Tourniquet Use Different Ways During Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To study short-term effect tourniquet use different way total knee arthroplasty . Methods : 60 patient randomly divide 2 group ( 30 cases/group ) : group A use tourniquet throughout operation , group B use tourniquet start implantation prosthesis completion operation . Operation time , total measure blood loss , intraoperative transfusion volume , complication record . Hemoglobin level record preoperatively postoperative 1 , 3 , 7 14 day , limb circumference , pain score , knee joint range motion also record preoperatively postoperative 3,7 14 day .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible study include underwent initial unilateral TKA osteoarthritis rheumatoid arthritis . Patients diabetes , hemorrhagic disease , Hb < 100 g/L , peripheral neurovascular disease , malignant tumor , history vascular thrombosis , history infection lower limb exclude
